release.change: Updated to latest version of APL, with better support of proxy change notification to system
Added infrastructure for proxy saving feature that will be added in next version
Added What's new dialog at application startup
Added Help section in application menu
Fixed assets loading exception on some devices
Improved stability and overall application performances
Temporary disabled editing of networks with Wi-Fi enterprise security (802.1X)
Added support for devices with API version greater than or equal to 11
